14.content:
When Maisie woke up she was still on her couch, but noticed that she wasn't on earth anymore. She got up and looked around and noticed that the land was full of buildings and people. Masie wasn't familiar with the place so she looked around. She saw a person and asked, "excuse me sir where am I?" The man looked at her sidebar and said, " Um do I know you?" Maisie said, "No I am sorry but I am Maisie and I am new here." The man replied, "Oh why didn't you say so? You are on planet Mobius in Central town." Maisie replied, "Um thanks" The man said, "No problem have a nice day." Maisie walked away and went back to the couch. She thought that she was dreaming and went to sleep.
When she woke up she noticed that she was still outside except she was surrounded by flat grassy land. She knew that she wasn't dreaming this time and got up off the couch again. When she got up this time she heard a racecar sound which was followed up with a blue blur. Maisie said, "No way I can't believe that I am actually on Sonic's world. She heard the sound again, but the blue blur stopped. Maisie saw that she was right in front of her favorite cartoon character Sonic. Sonic said,"Hello there can I help you? Maisie was shocked and speechless. Sonic looked at her and said, "Are you okay?" Maisie regained her composure and replied, "Oh I am fine Sonic.?" Sonic was confused and said, "Who are you and how do you know my name?"

1551.content: Maisie: ah, my head. What the? AWESOME! I'm on a spaceship!
1551.title: A Space or Starship?

choices: A voice sounds over the living quarters' PA system.
A Stranger walks into Maisie's room.
15511.content: After she got out of her bed and looked in utter amazement out her room's huge window into the inky black abyss of space, Maisie decided to explore the ship, and was suprised at how her room's closet apparently contained a piece of every kind of clothing EVER, including identical copies of her own clothes, and many kinds of clothing she'd never seen before.
15511.title: The STRANGER Frontier

155111.content:
The voice made Maisie jump.
Maisie: WHAT THE FUDGE?
155111.title: A voice sounds over the living quarters' PA...

choices: She gets to the Bridge, seeing no one else.
She encounters someone on the way there.
1551111.content:
Voice:"I repeat, will the now-fudged visitor please use the door on her right, then turn left in the following corridor. Yes, that means YOU. From there, keep walking until you see a sign that says 'Bridge', then follow the arrow. Then, walk through the giant door with the giant golden two-headed eagle on it. Do that, and you'll be on the main bridge. I'll introduce myself when you get there."
Maisie:"Wait, I have questio-"
The voice spoke again:"Please just do as I ask, alright? You're safe here."
Grumbling, Maisie set off for the bridge.
1551111.title: Instructions from On High.

15511111.title: She gets to the Bridge, seeing no one else.

155111111.content: Maisie looked around the bridge, amazed by what she was seeing. The Bridge was lined with the usual computer consoles, of course, but in stereo! In addition, the walls and ceiling shined a brilliant shade of gold, and the same eagle on the door was repeated throughout the bridge. The strangest thng there, though, was in the center: What Maisie assumed to be the captain's chair appeared to be part throne, part lounge chair. It was raised on beautifully carved wooden effigies that somehow coexisted with and complemented the adjacent, fused steel beams, which were also emblazoned with the strange golden eagle and colored bright gold. The chair itself was made of leather and had two sets of armrests that were half polished wood, half steel and leather.
155111111.title: The Meeting

1551111111.content: Maisie: Wow... This is so much better than school!
1551111111.title: The Meeting, Continued!

15511111111.content:
Suddenly, a voice spoke in reply:"I bet it is, Maisie. I bet it is..."
Shocked and afraid, Maisie asked: "Who are you?! Where am I?! Why am I here?! Show yourself!"
The voice responded:"I will answer most questions you must have for me in due time, child. As to who and where I am, you will know shortly, but you should have already figured out part of it."
Maisie then realized that the voice sounded oddly familiar... "Wait, you're the one that directed me here over the loudspeaker, aren't you?"
The voice spoke once more:"Yes, well done, young one. I have, of course, lead you here for a reason, but first...", then, Maisie heard a large booming sound, then saw the throne/chair rise from the floor, and then seemed to hover when it stopped about ten feet from the deck. She then heard a kind of whirring sound, like that of a computer or an elevator, or... the platform rising out of the hole that was beneath the now floating chair. On this platform stood a young man a couple years older than Maisie that had unkempt dark brown hair wearing a T-shirt, jeans, average sneakers, and a pair of eyeglasses. The young man then spoke: "let's get acquianted, shall we? I obviously already know who you are, Maisie. You may call me the Stranger, at least for the time being. This is my ship, designed and built it myself, with some help from my very tiny metal friends."
Maisie, astounded, gasped:"But....., you're what, 15?"
The Stranger replied, "16, actually. Good to finally meet you, for the scond time."
Maisie inquired:" What do you mean, 'For the second-"
The Stranger interrupted her:" Ah! All in due time, child. All in due time..."
15511111111.title: The Meeting GET ON WITH IT!!!!!

155111111111.content:
Maisie: Well, I'm 12 and strangley very fast....... (confused face)
Stranger: I know.
Maisie: (surprised and confused face)
155111111111.title: They get acquianted.

choices: Keep going with their conversation, Maisie's continued confusion is optional.
1551111111111.content:
Stranger:"Why so suprised? I already know your name AND easily predicted where you'd be, so why wouldn't I know your age and any 'abilities' or 'talents' you would or will have? Also, while you were asleep, I had your DNA sampled (with robots and nanothings, of course!), then scanned and analyzed. Then I examined your possible potential in a variety of fields and characteristics, and your probable rate of progression in each of these, throughout your currect natural lifetime, of course."
Maisie:"What are you talking about, my potential in a variety of fields and my 'probable rate of progression throughout my CURRENT natural LIFETIME?"
1551111111111.title: Stranger Times, Indeed!

15511111111111.content:
Maisie: What the heck do you mean?
Stranger: (Sighs)
15511111111111.title: Maisie's confusion and all is revealed!

155111111111111.content: The Stranger explains to Maisie:" See, the thing is, I'm a time traveler, and each of the computers around you is literally a quadrillion^100 more powerful and fast as a supercomputer, but they're stone tablets compared to the slowest and weakest LED light in ANY of my labs. So, yeah, sequencing your genes, predicting your future appearance and attributes, and analyzing your various bodily system pathways was incredibly simple. By the way, we're in orbit around Eartth's natural Moon, and it's early July, but 800 years from your time. So, Maisie, want to go anywhere or when?"
155111111111111.title: The Stranger's Strangeness Strangely gets Stranger

1551111111111111.content:
Maisie followed the stranger around the ship and into the universe.
Maisie: Wow!
1551111111111111.title: A universe Tour!

15511111111111111.content: "And this is the gateway to targeting range sector of the ship, where you'll find plenty of ammo for each and every individual weapon there, and there's hundreds of each weapon and any kind of modifications for and of them. Plus, I have each and every ranged weapon that will ever exist or has existed, in this reality or otherwise. You may use it whenever you like, and you'll need the practice, considering where and when we might go to or end up. Well, that concludes the tour of this deck's innership gateway room. Now then, where or when would you like to go? But choose wisely; the first destination's always special!" With that, the Stranger finished his tour of that 9999999999th of his ship. Maisie was bewildered and fascinated by all that she was seeing, and said: "I'd like to go to....."
15511111111111111.title: Let the Roaming begin!

155111111111111111.content: Maisie: the golden bridge. A question: when will I go home?
155111111111111111.title: The golden bridge!!

1551111111111111111.content: The Stranger answers and asks:"You can go home at any time. Which golden bridge, and when?"
1551111111111111111.title: A Question of Destination

15511111111111111111.content: Maisie: Is there a golden bridge here? In this universe.
15511111111111111111.title: You pick

155111111111111111111.content: The Stranger asks Maisie:"What do you mean by 'golden bridge', exactly?"
155111111111111111111.title: The Strangeness continues!

1551111111111111111111.content:
Maisie: Never mind. (Looks down and sees a planet which looks like earth) What's that planet called.
Stranger: Mobius.
1551111111111111111111.title: What Golden bridge?

15511111111111111111111.content:
The Stranger asked:"Want to go see it?"
Maisie quickly said yes, and the Stranger replied "Very well. Where on Mobius do you want to go, and how would you like to arrive, my child?"
Maisie, confused once more, asked:"What do you mean?"
The Stranger explained:"Well, you can arrive by teleportation, drop pod, shuttlecraft, levitation, etc. Also, you didn't say WHERE you'd like to go yet."
Suddenly, warning alarms started sounding throughout the ship. "Ah, man! Not now!" Maisie, freaking out, asked:"What? What is it?"
The Stranger answered her:"there's a pretty big spacecraft in close proximity to my ship, and it's charging weapons and launching support craft!" He then leaned down to a console and flipped through screens to a magnified image of the ship. It was....
15511111111111111111111.title: Strange Visit

155111111111111111111112.content:
Suddenly, the alarms were even worser!

Alarms:Hijackers are taking your ship!

Stranger:What!? How!?
Maisie:I'm scared now.....
Stranger: Don't worry, I'll protect you.

Enemy's soon came. They pointed guns at Stranger and Maisie.

Maisie:Goodbye world.
155111111111111111111112.title: Something WEIRD

1551111111111111111111121.content:
Time slowed down, as a strange boy in a special power suit appeared and shoots the enemy's.

Stranger:What?
Maisie:Who are you?

???:I can't answer that. Stay here. You two will be safe. (leaves, chasing the enemy's)
1551111111111111111111121.title: Something unexpected happens!

choices: They fight their way to the new arrival
15511111111111111111111211.content:
Then, another group of hijackers appear and surround Maisie and the Stranger:
With the jaws of death having finally caught up with him, the Stranger of Time and Space simply laughed:"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Do you REALLY expect me to be that easily beaten, my old enemy? REALLY? I mean, COME ON! You're above hijacking an ultraship, we both know this. Plus, you're SMART ENOUGH not to. So, what changed your mind?" With that, he then pulled a Fused Force trick from the other Galaxy: He mentally shocked the neural pathways of his attackers, severing their cerebral cortexes, thus crippling their minds from their bodies. They then fell to the deck floor, unable to even lift their hands to cradle their virtually severed heads.
The Stranger grabbed Maisie's hand, drew one of his greatpowerswords, brought up his arm-based fusion turrets, and said to his passenger:"Now then, let's go find that kid, shall we?"
15511111111111111111111211.title: Suddenly, more hijackers appear and surround them!

155111111111111111111112111.content: ???: (in the basement level) Lily! Get upstairs! Now!
